text: 13 Phase #1: Growing — Each txn requests the locks that it needs from the DBMS's lock manager. — The lock manager grants/denies lock requests. Phase #2: Shrinking — The txn is allowed to only release locks that jt previouslv acquired. It cannot acquire new locks. { .>_,_ ‘D 14:5:18:13 - TwoPhase Locking > À [cc) * Èl | E: CMU Database Systems - 17 Two-Phase Locking Concurrency Control (Fall 2018)
